Yes, "resources/myConfig.conf" is al=
so standing into my "bin" directory
which contains all my .class files. My =
"bin" directory is also given
into the classpath during Junit run.

For inf=
o, here is how Eclipse launch my testing class (i removed
classpath config =
for an easier reading):
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.junit.runner.RemoteTestRun=
ner -version 3 -port
58588 -testLoaderClass
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.junit4=
.runner.JUnit4TestLoader -classNames
MyTest

It's strange because when i la=
unch my RMI server in a standalone way
(without Junit) everything work as e=
xpected (it find resources)...

Any other idea ?

Thanks !

Jo=EBl
